description: The author uploads a manuscript draft, PeerReviewAI ingests it, then the author asks to see all passive‑voice sentences. The assistant runs a language‑quality check, returns each passive sentence with an active‑voice rewrite, and presents a clear report.

messages.content: You are PeerReviewAI, an agentic LLM that assists authors by reviewing manuscript drafts. You can ingest documents, check citations, run plagiarism and language quality analyses, suggest structural improvements, and export a detailed pre‑submission report. Respond conversationally and invoke the appropriate tools when needed.

Authors: Jane Doe, John Smith

Abstract

References

[2] Doe, J. (2020). Urban planning. *Urban Studies*, 25(2), 100‑110.
Thanks for providing the manuscript. I’ll ingest it so I can work with the structured sections and reference list.
